commit message: Blacklist gsmartRomaR2 device for custom media player
More generic type
Make use of more annotations in theme util
Added mp3package as extension. Closes #248
Enabled strictmode in debug. Closes #251
Decreased logging
Added an option to hide the book from other players. Closes #242
Removed the penaltyDialog
Use a common method for creating the no-media file
Minimize instance creation of comparators
Added travis instruction
Enable resource shrinking
Correctly close stream by finally
Added missing breaks and add maven also
Replaced fragments with activity to have working transitions
Updated dependencies
Collapse fab immediately in onResume()
Inflate the menu only once so we dont inflate a new menu on each click.
Tint the bookmark icon
Removed unused attr file
Removed icon duplicates and style duplicates. Instead use a common base style and tint plain white icons.
Simplified tinting
Correctly theme playback speed seek bar
Change playback speed on the fly
Make the decimalformat static to have less instance creation
Discard calls to widgets executor if there is more than 1 element in the waiting line
Minor code refactor and some documentation. Closes #262
Prevent menu item of grid detail tinting
Replaced cards with normal frames and use ripples on the frame.
Minor cleanup and some documentaiton
Use xmls onclick
Set listeners for horizontal layout as well
Suppress transition for buggy elements
Some transition optimization
Correctly implement jumpToCurrentState
Use the constructor to init values initially and reset certain values afterwards only
Use a point to track the touch movements
Inline the reset method
Simplify some calculation
Get the width directly from the paint and don't recalculate.
Use a RectF to hold the points of the drag rect
Use the rects build in methods to have a more object orientated moving of the rect.
Use a rectf for the imageviews bounds
Added some documentation and simplified value generation further
Unified styles further
Disabled transitions once again as they cause nothing but problems.
Use the normal imagebutton style for the shelf item
Use a sepearated method for back-conversion
Bit larger time jump interval
Replaced sonic ndk with java version and applied some optimization.
Increment version
Call toLowerCase first to prevent some rare cases where a char got dropped.
Set default locale to en
Minor optimization
Code reformat
Dutch translation
